description: This file contains the implementation of NotesViewModel, which manages the UI state related to notes and performs CRUD operations by interacting with NotesRepository.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that holds UI data for notes list, handles CRUD operations, and manages snackbar messages.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note with the specified title and content, then updates snackbar message.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note with trimmed values and timestamps, then updates snackbar message.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the specified note and updates snackbar message.
